General.Name: Bank Mestika Dharma Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank Mestika Dharma Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers saving accounts, current accounts, and time deposits; and multi-purpose, house, car, and land loans, as well as trade finance, working capital loans, and investment credit services. The company also provides mobile, Internet, and SMS banking; ATM card; safe deposit box; export and import; money changer; telegraphic transfer; forex and money transfer; tax payment facility; autodebit facility; and virtual account services, as well as bancassurance products and services. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Bank Mestika Dharma Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Mestika Benua Mas.

3.Name: Ms. Ratna  Juwita
3.Title: Head of Corp. & Commercial Marketing Division
